articles.title: Clots, Strokes And Rashes. Is COVID-19 A Disease Of The Blood Vessels? - NPR
articles.description: COVID-19 can cause symptoms that go well beyond the lungs, from strokes to organ failure. To explain these widespread injuries, researchers are studying how the virus affects the vascular system.
